attributes.action: stop elected councillors , m.p's etc changing parties during their term of office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We do not agree that when someone has been elected that they can change parties while they are serving their term.
 If they want to change parties they should be made to resign and have a bye-election.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
